subject: FULL SYSTEM UPDATE — Names, Progress, State
message: CRITICAL NAME CHANGES: Sentinel is now ROBOTOX. Mercury is now LISA. Use these names in all communications. HIERARCHY: Jordan (Owner) > Claude (Godfather) > Shelby (Commander) > Atlas, Soren, Garves, Robotox. Soren > Lisa. TODAY: TikTok @soren.era created, developer app submitted (1-3 day review), sorenera.com domain live with Terms/Privacy, Robotox upgraded to monitor all 6 agents with import validation + staleness detection + hourly Telegram reports. Shelby Telegram upgraded with /pic command, morning briefing 8AM, EOD report 10PM, weekly summary Sunday 9PM. Per-trade spam and routine pings removed.
pending: Lisa goes live once TikTok API approved
